name: Low and medium intensity statins
title: Prescribing of low and medium intensity statins
as a percentage of prescribing of all statins
description: Items of low and medium intensity statins
as a percentage of items of all statins.
why_it_matters: 2014 NICE guidance on primary and secondary lipid modification
recommends the use of a high-intensity statin (i.e. one that reduces LDL cholesterol by 40% or more) with a low acquisition cost.
A table showing the percentage reduction of LDL cholesterol by statin doses can be found here
numerator_short: Low and medium intensity statin items
numerator_where:
bnf_code LIKE '0212000AA%' OR --Rosuvastatin Calcium 
bnf_code LIKE '0212000AC%' OR --Simvastatin & Ezetimibe 
bnf_code LIKE '0212000B0%' OR --Atorvastatin 
bnf_code LIKE '0212000C0%' OR --Cerivastatin 
bnf_code LIKE '0212000M0%' OR --Fluvastatin Sodium 
bnf_code LIKE '0212000X0%' OR --Pravastatin Sodium 
bnf_code LIKE '0212000Y0%' --Simvastatin 
) AND 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '0212000AAAAAAAA%' AND --Rosuvastatin Calc_Tab 10mg (brand and generic) 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '0212000AAAAABAB%' AND --Rosuvastatin Calc_Tab 20mg (brand and generic) 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '0212000AAAAACAC%' AND --Rosuvastatin Calc_Tab 40mg (brand and generic) 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '0212000B0AAABAB%' AND --Atorvastatin_Tab 20mg (brand and generic) 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '0212000B0AAACAC%' AND --Atorvastatin_Tab 40mg (brand and generic) 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '0212000B0AAADAD%' AND --Atorvastatin_Tab 80mg (brand and generic) 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '0212000B0AAANAN%' AND --Atorvastatin_Tab 30mg (brand and generic) 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '0212000B0AAAPAP%' AND --Atorvastatin_Tab 60mg (brand and generic) 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '0212000Y0AAAHAH%' --Simvastatin_Tab 80mg (brand and generic)
denominator_where:
bnf_code LIKE '0212000AA%' OR --Rosuvastatin Calcium 
bnf_code LIKE '0212000AC%' OR --Simvastatin & Ezetimibe 
bnf_code LIKE '0212000B0%' OR --Atorvastatin 
bnf_code LIKE '0212000C0%' OR --Cerivastatin 
bnf_code LIKE '0212000M0%' OR --Fluvastatin Sodium 
bnf_code LIKE '0212000X0%' OR --Pravastatin Sodium 
bnf_code LIKE '0212000Y0%' --Simvastatin
